name: code-review-workflow
description: Automated code review workflow using specialized review agents

language.description: Programming language to review (rust, typescript, python)

file_path.description: Path to the file or directory to review

steps.prompt: Review the code at ${file_path} for best practices, potential issues, and improvements. Provide detailed feedback with severity levels.
Format the code review results from the previous step into a structured markdown report with sections for Critical, High, Medium, and Low priority issues.
